findings.message: Fact-find claim inaccurate: `useOnlineStatus` consumed by `OfflineIndicator.tsx` but NOT by `Login.tsx`.
Overall acceptance says 'loan ops are queued' but task scope queues only `useLoansMutations.saveLoan`; other loan ops are online-only — success-criteria mismatch.
Inherited outcome contract `Why: TBD` — carries through from auto-sourced dispatch; acceptable.

post_autofix_note: Round 2 autofixes applied: Login.tsx removed from useOnlineStatus consumers (OfflineIndicator.tsx only); acceptance criteria updated to specify saveLoan (not all loan ops) is queued; online-only error note added. No Critical findings in Round 1 or Round 2. Score trajectory 5→7 confirms convergence. Stopping at Round 2 (no Critical remaining after Round 2 per protocol). Proceeding to build with Critique-Warning: partially-credible (lp_score 3.5).
